last_episode_to_air.name: Wealthy Men Only
last_episode_to_air.overview: A wealthy California man is gunned down in his own kitchen. Did his beautiful, young fiance mastermind the murder? Chris and Fatima are on the case.

name: Reasonable Doubt
overview: Two investigators re-examine controversial murder cases to help the desperate families of those convicted decide if it's time to appeal... or accept the guilty verdict once and for all.

episodes.name: Southern Justice
episodes.overview: Rapper Mac Phipps was on the fast track to fame when a young fan was shot and killed at one of his concerts. Mac was convicted of the murder but his parents believe he's the victim of old fashioned southern justice.

episodes.name: Rivals in Love
episodes.overview: Three firsts happened to Erick Westervelt in 2004: He fell in love, he had his heart broken, and he was charged with murder. Anderson and Lewkowicz investigate to see if there's enough evidence to prove his innocence beyond a reasonable doubt.

episodes.name: Guilt by Association
episodes.overview: David Johnson is serving hard time for a murder that took place at a New Year party, but his family insists he was a naive teenager who was in the wrong place at the wrong time.

episodes.name: Internal Affair
episodes.overview: Police officer James Kulbicki is convicted of murdering his pregnant teenage mistress. Chris Anderson and Melissa Lewkowicz attempt to figure out whether Kulbicki is innocent.

episodes.name: A Dying Declaration
episodes.overview: A preacher is ambushed and murdered, and his former lover is arrested and convicted of the crime, but the victim's dying words may be the key to exonerating the man he once loved.

episodes.name: Beneath the Surface
episodes.overview: Patty Wlasiuk dies after her truck plunges into a lake in 2002. While husband Peter insists it was a suicide attempt, a jury convicts him of Patty's murder. Chris and Melissa try to figure out what really happened.

episodes.name: Murder in a Bottle
episodes.overview: A Sunday-school teacher is convicted of murdering her husband by spiking his sports drink with windshield washer fluid. Chris and Melissa investigate to see whether she has been the victim of a rush to judgment.

episodes.name: Flesh and Blood
episodes.overview: A California couple is brutally murdered and their son is convicted of the crime. Now, the victim’s sister has reached out to Chris and Melissa for help, convinced her nephew has been wrongfully convicted of committing this unthinkable crime.

episodes.name: Failure To Remember
episodes.overview: Penny Brummer is accused of murdering her ex-girlfriend’s best friend in a jealous rage. However, she was so drunk that night she was in a blackout state. Can Chris and Melissa help fill in the gaps of her memory to prove her innocence?

episodes.name: Convicted by a Hair
episodes.overview: In 2011, 19-year old KC Grondin becomes involved with his first girlfriend, then he is charged with her murder; Grondin’s parents are convinced he was the victim of a rush to judgment, and they call in Chris and Fatima to reopen the case.

episodes.name: High-Stakes Homicide
episodes.overview: Pest control worker Kim Cain is convicted of murdering a 71-year-old socialite in Palm Beach, Fla.; the prosecution argues the victim found Cain stealing her jewelry to support a gambling addiction; Chris and Fatima seek to prove his innocence.

episodes.name: The Code
episodes.overview: Rapper Corey "C-Murder" Miller is convicted of killing one of his fans in a crowded nightclub; Chris Anderson and Fatima Silva are called in by C-Murder's family to uncover the truth.

episodes.name: The Truck Driver's Wife
episodes.overview: Perry Mikell admits he was a serial cheater incapable of monogamy, but he insists that doesn't mean he killed his wife in a seedy motel room; now, Mikell's sister and fiancée have called in Chris and Fatima to see if they got the wrong man.

episodes.name: Loose Lips
episodes.overview: Seventeen years after Craig White's disappearance, his cousin, Jesse Watkins, is suddenly arrested for his murder; Chris and Fatima investigate what really happened in 1990.

episodes.name: Suburban Tragedy
episodes.overview: In 2008, Ryan Widmer is convicted of murdering his new wife, Sarah, but he swears he's not guilty; Chris and Fatima investigate the evidence to prove his innocence.

episodes.name: A Desperate Daughter
episodes.overview: In 1988, Virginia Wells is arrested for murdering her parents for money; Chris and Fatima investigate to see if she's serving time for a crime she did not commit.

episodes.name: Lies or Alibis
episodes.overview: Ten years after charges against him are dropped, Scott Davis is tried and convicted of murdering his estranged wife's boyfriend; Davis' family calls in Chris and Fatima to investigate whether his conviction constitutes a miscarriage of justice.

episodes.name: Hero or Killer?
episodes.overview: In 1991, 15-year-old David Clark is convicted of murdering a 12-year-old girl who died in a house fire; now, Clark's sisters ask Chris and Fatima to investigate his case and help them prove he was wrongfully convicted.

episodes.name: A Dying Plea
episodes.overview: Jerome Scott is found stabbed to death in his home; 16 years later, police move in on his ex-wife, Patricia Wright, claiming she killed him for money; now, Wright's sister and daughter are on a crusade to prove the wrong person is behind bars.

episodes.name: When The Gun Went Off
episodes.overview: A Missouri man faints and wakes up to find his wife is dead. Police say it was murder. But three generations of his family insist it was just a tragic accident. Chris and Fatima investigate.

episodes.name: Obsessed with Celeste
episodes.overview: In one of their wildest investigations ever, retired detective Chris Anderson and defense attorney Fatima Silva look into the case of Celeste Beard: a woman convicted of getting her lesbian lover to murder her rich, elderly husband.

episodes.name: A Shot in the Dark
episodes.overview: A Virginia man has been behind bars for over twenty-years based on the eyewitness testimony of one nearly blind woman. The convict's desperate mom and sister beg Chris and Fatima to join their crusade for justice.

episodes.name: Flames of Passion
episodes.overview: A Tennessee man is in prison, convicted of killing his girlfriend by setting their house on fire. But now, his daughter and best friend say there was no crime- just a tragic accident. Chris and Fatima investigate.

episodes.name: The Meanest Drunk in the South
episodes.overview: He was a former cop, a former alcoholic and one of the nastiest men in Texas- but Warren Horinek's friends say that doesn't make him a murderer.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: High school coach Mike Bernos is found dead in a recliner, his body riddled with 15 bullets; his adopted son, Daniel Blan, is convicted of the murder; Daniel's wife and childhood friend are fighting for his freedom.

episodes.name: A Body a Trough and 800 Pounds of Concrete
episodes.overview: She was a pioneer; the first female deputy sheriff in Oglethorpe County's history. But now Tracy Fortson is just another inmate- convicted of murdering her boyfriend. Was it justice? Or a set-up? Chris and Fatima investigate.

episodes.name: Without a Trace
episodes.overview: An Oklahoma woman disappears without a trace- never to be heard from again. But years later, police move in and arrest her ex-boyfriend. Now, his mom and sister are fighting for his freedom. Will Chris and Fatima join their crusade?

episodes.name: Murder at her Doorstep
episodes.overview: A Virginia man is convicted of leaving a deadly bomb on his ex-girlfriend's porch. Now his daughter and mother are joining forces to fight for his freedom. Will Chris and Fatima join them?

episodes.name: It Wasn't Me
episodes.overview: The wife and sister of a convicted murderer in Chicago insist he was the victim of mistaken identity. Chris and Fatima re-investigate the case.

episodes.name: A Murder in Cave Creek
episodes.overview: Justin Lunsford, convicted of murdering a popular bartender after a night of sex and drugs, insists he’s innocent; his brother and wife are asking Chris and Fatima to join their fight to free Justin.

episodes.name: My Best Friend's Murder
episodes.overview: A man takes the fall for his best friend's murder in Ogema, Minnesota.

episodes.name: Deadhead
episodes.overview: Bruce Walton is in prison, convicted of the fatal stabbing of his lifelong friend Roy Fuller; Bruce's sisters are convinced he is innocent, and they are hoping Chris and Fatima will join them in their fight to free Bruce.

episodes.name: For Her Love
episodes.overview: War veteran Tim Wright is in prison for killing his girlfriend's ex, but his family is convinced he is innocent. Now they've reached out to Chris Anderson and Fatima Silva, hoping they will join their fight.

episodes.name: The Cult of David
episodes.overview: Yvonne Layne, a beautiful mother of five, dies due to a murder plot masterminded by her ex, David Thorne, and carried out by his friend. Both men are convicted, but David’s family refuses to accept the verdict and wants Chris and Fatima to help.

episodes.name: Trapped in the Middle
episodes.overview: A woman calls for Chris and Fatima to decide whether they think her husband is innocent.

episodes.name: Hypnotized
episodes.overview: Sisters fight for a man convicted of a 1995 gang-related hit as a teen.

episodes.name: To Dye For
episodes.overview: A jury convicts a woman for the triple murder of an Ohio family.

episodes.name: State of Denial
episodes.overview: A family fears their son is wrongly serving a life sentence for murder.

episodes.name: A $25,000 Performance
episodes.overview: A self-admitted con man insists he's not a murderer.

episodes.name: Guiltless or Heartless?
episodes.overview: A respected California probation officer is in prison for the brutal murder of his pregnant wife. Chris and Fatima re-investigate the case to determine whether or not he was wrongfully convicted.

episodes.name: Prison Mom
episodes.overview: A Texas woman is convicted of gunning down her husband while he slept, but her children are convinced it was actually a suicide. Detective Chris Anderson and defense attorney Fatima Silva are on the case.

episodes.name: The Jerk
episodes.overview: An Arizona man is convicted of murdering his beautiful wife by stuffing cocaine down her throat. His children say their dad might be a jerk, but he's not a murderer. Chris and Fatima are on the case.

episodes.name: Bringing a Gun to a Fist Fight
episodes.overview: A 22-year old Pennsylvania man is in prison after shooting someone during a road rage incident. But his family believes he did it in self-defense. Chris Anderson and Fatima Silva are on the case.

episodes.name: Murder Without Motive
episodes.overview: A Florida man is serving life in prison for a murder he had absolutely no motive to commit. Now his family wants Chris and Fatima to join their fight to free him.

episodes.name: Aunts and Artifacts
episodes.overview: A Florida mom is convinced her son was wrongfully convicted of murder. But she is torn: the victim was her own sister. Chris and Fatima will decide whether they'll get behind this case, or whether justice has already been served.

episodes.name: The Ex Files
episodes.overview: Patricia Rorrer is serving a life sentence, convicted of driving 500 miles to kill her ex-boyfriend's new wife and his baby. Her friends say she was railroaded by the system and they want Chris and Fatima to join their fight to free her.

episodes.name: The $60 Murder
episodes.overview: A Pennsylvania man gets a life sentence for murdering a friend in a robbery gone bad. But his family says- who would kill someone over $60? Did the system get this one right? Chris and Fatima are on the case.

episodes.name: Villian or Victim?
episodes.overview: A Saint Louis mother is serving a life sentence for a murder she insists she didn't commit. Chris and Fatima re-investigate her explosive case which involves drugs, greed and betrayal.

episodes.name: Wealthy Men Only
episodes.overview: A wealthy California man is gunned down in his own kitchen. Did his beautiful, young fiance mastermind the murder? Chris and Fatima are on the case.
